channel.title: Canvas Hacking
channel.description:
Sorry if it's been asked 1000 times.
I'm kinda new to this, but basically, I hooked the Canvas class in Runescape OldSchool, and changed the super class of it to my own canvas class.
I don't know how to double buffer/what to put in this class.
Can someone point me in the right direction? I get this error when I run(With my canvas class empty, so it's going to error. ;) )
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.VerifyError: (class: by, method: af signature: (IIII)I) Call to wrong initialization method at bo.nf(Unknown Source) at bo.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)[/code]

item.title: Canvas Hacking
item.dc:creator: @slavemaster veer
item.description:
@slavemaster wrote:

You replaced the superclass but it’s still trying to call Canvas/()V rather than your/canvas/()V

Read full topic

item.title: Canvas Hacking

item.description:
